text: Stege Pharmacy was founded in 1706 in Stege on the island of Møn, Denmark. ==History== Stege Pharmacy was founded on 16 January 1706 by Frederik Christian Hartmann. ==Architecture== The pharmacy consists of a main wing from 1799 and a side wing from 1889. It was listed on the Danish registry of protected buildings and places in 1024 and the scope of the heritage listing was extended in 1992. == References == ==External links== * Official website * History * Marcus Mackeprang Category:Pharmacies of Denmark Category:Listed pharmacy buildings in Denmark Category:Listed buildings and structures in Vordingborg Municipality Category:Danish companies established in 1706
title: Stege Pharmacy
